name: Broken Rosary, Beside a Gun
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN :)
(Blue box)

**Note: Press spacebar or enter to skip dialogue writing :)

There is an old man in the woods, alone with his thoughts for far too long. Hear his words, and maybe he'll hear yours.

Made in 6 weeks for SuNoFes Jam

This game contains loud, sudden noises and onscreen (though not graphic) animal death. It also deals with topics of grief and violence which may be disturbing to some players.

Production: Jebadiah01

Programming/Design: Ser_Junkan, limegreenicy

Writing/Music: GandoofThePurpl

Art: Bugfellow

Sound Effects:
